artist: Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.; Designer: Paul Gedeohn
description: Large rhododendron stems. Vert. Rpt. 24.75; half-drop horiz. Rpt. 27". Large, dense rhodendron print in purple & green on peach & gold hor. waves. Vert. Rpt. 24.75. Half dropped. Desert Rose
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Paul Gedeohn
text:
The inspiration for this image was a photograph. But instead of creating a drawing to represent the rhododendrons, Gedeohn edited the photo itself so the imagery could be manipulated into the repeating pattern.  

The coloration for many of Larsen designs was quite complex.  As can be seen on the outer edge of this panel, there is an alignment of nineteen small, colored circles.  Each circle represents a specific color needed to print this design.  When producing color variations of the same pattern, the designer will indicate a different range of colors to be used with the nineteen print screens needed to make this fabric.
title: Rhodos
